meanings.definition: The glow or light that remains after the sun has set.
meanings.sent1: As the sun disappeared, the afterglow painted the sky in soft colors.
meanings.sent2: The afterglow of the sunset filled the horizon with a warm light.
meanings.sent3: The afterglow of the sunset made the clouds look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left an afterglow in his heart long after she had left.
meanings.sent5: The afterglow of the sunset was so beautiful, it felt like a painting come to life.

meanings.definition: A pleasant feeling that lingers after an enjoyable experience.
meanings.sent1: After the concert, she was filled with the afterglow of happiness.
meanings.sent2: The afterglow of their laughter stayed with him long after they had left.
meanings.sent3: The afterglow of the party made her feel like she could conquer the world.
meanings.sent4: His heart was filled with the afterglow of contentment after a day well spent.
meanings.sent5: The afterglow of their friendship was a constant source of joy in his life.
